product_name: Not Your Mother'sCurl Talk To Go Mini Styling Kit
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsWhether you're traveling, sampling, or staying stocked with back ups for your car or bag, Not Your Mother's Curl Talk To-Go Mini Styling Kit is a styling savior with three travel-sized products from our most-loved collection: Frizz Control Sculpting Gel, Curl Activating Mousse, & Defining Cream.
details: DetailsFeaturesControls frizzEnhances and defines curlsSafe for color-treated hairFor all curl typesCitrus jasmine scentFormulated WithoutSulfatesSiliconesParabensDrying alcoholGlutenCruelty freeIncludesCurl Talk Frizz Control Sculpting Gel (2.0 oz): Lock your look in place with a firm, flake-free, flexible holdCurl Talk Curl Activating Mousse (2.0 oz): Keeps curls beautifully defined with a light, touchable holdCurl Talk Defining Cream (2.0 oz): Create maximized definition with lasting elasticity and shineItem 2561013How To UseCurl Talk Frizz Control Styling Gel: Scrunch into hair. Air dry or style as desired.Curl Talk Activating Mousse: Shake vigorously. Work evenly through curls. Air dry or style as desiredCurl Talk Defining Curl Cream: On damp hair, apply a small amount evenly from the roots to ends, adding more as needed. Air dry or style as desired.Pro Tip: To create the perfect styling cocktail, mix together equal parts cream and gel.IngredientsCurl Talk Defining Cream: Water (Aqua) (Eau), Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoalkane, Shea Butter Ethyl Esters, Polyquaternium-10, Keratin Amino Acids, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Acyl Coenzyme A Desaturase, Lactobacillus/Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, PG-Hydroxyethylcellulose Cocodimonium Chloride, Laureth-7, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol.Curl Talk Activating Mousse: Water (Aqua), Polyquaternium-46, Isobutane, Propane, Propylene Glycol, Cetrimonium Chloride, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Oleth-20, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Benzophenone-4, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal.Curl Talk Sculpting Gel: Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Vp/Va Copolymer, Propanediol, Pvp, Peg-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Lactobacillus/Tomato Fruit Ferment Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Keratin Amino Acids, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Acyl Coenzyme A Desaturase, Carbomer, Fragrance (Parfum), Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Curl Talk Frizz Control Styling Gel: Scrunch into hair. Air dry or style as desired.Curl Talk Activating Mousse: Shake vigorously. Work evenly through curls. Air dry or style as desiredCurl Talk Defining Curl Cream: On damp hair, apply a small amount evenly from the roots to ends, adding more as needed. Air dry or style as desired.Pro Tip: To create the perfect styling cocktail, mix together equal parts cream and gel.

reviews.headline: Curls are stylin
reviews.comments: Love this smaller sized travel set, I have 3a type hair and it was perfect for my styles. Very easy to use and not sticky

reviews.headline: It's so good but don't add to much product or it will get cr
reviews.comments: It was my first time and it was awesome

reviews.headline: It's okay
reviews.comments: It didn't work to well on my 2b hair

reviews.headline: Easy to use! Great intro pack for 2B hair.
reviews.comments: Im just realizing my hair is 2B, i always blow dried my hair snd curled it with a curling iron or flat ironed it. So i watched a few tiktok tutorials on how to style natural hair. I saw a lot of people using these products and when i saw the sample pack i knew this would be great to try. The only additional product I used was Ouai's Leave in conditioner. I put that im my freshly washed hair, rhen used prayer hands to apply curl cream, combed through. Then applied the mousse using prayer hands, scrunched. Then added gel scrunched with a t shirt to remove excess product. Finally I used a diffuser to dry roots and then scrunched section by section with the deffuser and my curls came out perfect. Took about 20 mins.

reviews.headline: Great value for money, ok products
reviews.comments: I have short, extremely frizzy hair, and I got this set in hopes of bringing out my natural waves. The curl cream is great for right after a shower with wet hair, but I was disappointed with the other two, which leave my hair crunchy and stringy.

reviews.headline: Horrible smell
reviews.comments: The hair cream smells like fish and leaves your hair smelling dirty. The gel is the only one thats okay, because the mousse did not work.

reviews.headline: Okay..
reviews.comments: I have been wanting to do something with my hair because with it being so long and thick, curls tend to fall out once my hair is dry and I'm only sometimes lucky enough to get a wave. When I put this product in, I was super excited and it was very easy and simple to apply. I scrunched my hair and it was looking way better than usual, but I was worried it wasn't going to last... and I was right. They lasted as long as if I don't use the product and what's the purpose if it only looks good when I'm going to sleep? The products smell good but for me they didn't do much of a difference. Also, my hair felt dry and my head was a bit itchy in the morning. I hope they will work the next time I use!

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: It works really well on my hair. It took the frizz away all day.

reviews.headline: It was good
reviews.comments: It was good for my wavy hair i like it

reviews.headline: The Curl is amazing
reviews.comments: I purchased this product for my daughter, she has very curly hair.  All you need is a small amount of product to do the job.  We mix equal parts of the gel and cream.

reviews.headline: I definitely think this set is worth it
reviews.comments: This set is sooo good. All of these products helped define my hair and I will definitely be buying the full sizes. The mousse is the best I have repurchased multiple times. For the price it is very worth it and I highly recommend this set.

reviews.headline: Bought full size
reviews.comments: Used in 3c/4a type hair. Applied in small sections both gel and a little mousse then used diffuser to set elongated curls. After a week, wearing a bonnet at night, hair was still soft, no white flakes and defined curls.

reviews.headline: Great styling kit!!
reviews.comments: Loved this! I had already tried the curl cream and mousse but also wanted to try the gel without the commitment to buying the larger size in case I didn't like it. I really liked all 3 products together! I also needed these for on the go, so it works out. The smell is good. I feel like my curls last longer even after sleeping.

reviews.headline: Definitely the Best
reviews.comments: I have fine, wavy hair that gets weighed down easy or even kinda greasy looking with every other hair gel product. This stuff is perfect and allows volume and not just stuck to my head . Plus it's incredibly affordable. Can't go wrong with that!

reviews.headline: buy again
reviews.comments: I love this product I would definitely buy again just in a bigger size

reviews.headline: Hair Loss!!
reviews.comments: I used this curl styling set twice and both times i experienced so much hair loss!!! I lost so much more hair than usual in the shower after using the products even one time. Great way to try our products but a HARD PASS for me. Never again. Wish i could get a refund.

reviews.headline: Definition of perfect curls
reviews.comments: Love love love this styling kit,so hydrating.i hope they make a bigger size to yhis kit!

reviews.headline: Not bad!!!
reviews.comments: I bought the mini sizes just to test them out, Honestly not terrible, extremely lightweight, doesnt feel crunchy, i am not totally like wow with it but it does the job. I al still on the journey of healthy curly hair, it doesnt really hydrate my hair which ny hair needs hydration. I will say it does not look dead with the product so its a yes from me!

reviews.headline: Great way to try new curly hair styling products.
reviews.comments: Loved getting to try all of these products and seeing how well they worked on my hair. They all have slightly different results for volume and curl, but they all work quite well at preserving my curls after a watch. I'm going to try some of them in conjunction and see how well that goes. The mousse is much lighter than the gels and feels really nice. The creme gives fantastic volume. Really happy with my purchase.

reviews.headline: Best stuff so far
reviews.comments: Idk really how to do my wavy hair, but this stuff holds so freaking well and its the best i've used ever. I will 100% be rebuying

media.headline: Great lightweight line for finer hair
I would buy this product again and again
media.caption: My hair done at ulta and bought products at ulta

media.headline: I would definitely buy this product again!
media.caption: Curl updo with Not your Mothers!

media.headline: I would buy ALL of these products again and again

faceoff_positive.comments: I really enjoyed using this! I wanted to be able to try out the different products without committing to full sized packages in case I didn't like it. I've been learning how to style my 2b/3a waves/curls and was recommended this line. I'm not sure what the cream does but I use that and the gel on wash days. Don't be afraid to use too much gel, you can just scrunch it out if need be, but I never had to. I don't think I initially used enough! It has a much softer hold than the mousse, so you gotta use more product. I'm going to buy the full sized of the gel and cream because I liked those, will continue to test out the mousse and see. I would say this lasted for like 3-4 washes, enough to know whether I liked it or not/it worked, etc.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Way to Try Out Products

faceoff_negative.comments:
This is a great set to try these products without spending full price for each item. However, I am not fully in love. I will describe why below: 

First, I am not a fan of the smell. Each product leaves a very pungent odor on your hair that I can only describe as a fake fragrance/product alcohol type smell. I could smell this stuff even after I showered thoroughly the next day. 

Second, if your hair is not fully wavy this stuff will NOT help create those waves. I found a major difference in the results if I plopped my hair first to bring out my waves before applying product rather than just scrunching my hair with these products and not plopping my hair. The products themselves just have no hold to them to help you achieve and lock in those waves/curls. 

Third, my hair felt like it had product in it and did not feel soft. It actually felt uncomfortable throughout the day. However, when I looked at my hair in the mirror, my hair looked shiny and not like it had a hard cast of product in it which was nice. Just felt producty. 

Fourth, major product buildup. I got these little white dots everywhere in my hair the day after using these products which was NOT cute. My guess based on application would be the cream and gel do not seem to work well together. 

All in all, if you have naturally wavy or curly hair these should be fine. However, if you want a product that will help give you more waves/curls I would look elsewhere. Also if you are sensitive to smells I would stay away. I am glad I tried this because in the end, I like to keep a curl cream on hand for when I curl my hair and this will work perfectly. But for me, I am just not a fan of these products if I were to use them for a natural wave routine because my hair needs more help than these can offer.
faceoff_negative.headline: Just Okay

rollup.name: Curl Talk To Go Mini Styling Kit
